text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to identify the specific elements the Germans must prove to recover for reputational damages: (1) the security vulnerability existed at the time of the contract, (2) the vulnerability caused a loss to the distributor, and (3) the termination was necessary.
